revised_title: The History and Evolution of Printing Techniques
tldr: The article discusses the history and evolution of printing techniques, from the ancient Romans and Chinese to the development of metal type printing by Peter Scheffer. It also touches upon the different methods of printing, such as woodcut, metal type, and plate printing, and their advancements over time. The author provides insights into the development of paper, bookbinding, and the devices and rebus used by ancient printers.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Book history and printing culture
